column4: postgresql question - I don't understand why "psql -U postgres ..." reports "could not connect to server" but "sudo su postgres -c psql" does connect to the server
probably because it needs root perms to connet but anyways sudo su is sorta of redunant
thanks - thought "sudo su postgres -c psql" ran that command as the postgres user - which would be different than "sudo psql"
nah it just makes it run as root sudo su - postgres would though
